title: Klopp's Short Offseason Critique
description:
The FC crew react to Jurgen Klopp criticizing the short length of this year's short offseason and debate if his comments have any validity. Plus, Gab Marcotti ranks his top 5 players under the most pressure entering this season and Manchester United still have a Cristiano Ronaldo sized cloud over their heads as the new campaign approaches.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Klopp criticizes short offseason; Top 5 players under the most pressure this season; Man United's Ronaldo sized cloud
